code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Container,Typography,Card,CardContent,CardMedia,Grid}from'@mui/material';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Profile=()=>{const[profile,setProfile]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchProfile=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('/api/profile');setProfile(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching profile',error);}};fetchProfile();},[]);if(!profile){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{style:{marginTop:'20px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h5",children:"Loading profile..."})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{style:{marginTop:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"h4",gutterBottom:true,children:[profile.name,"'s Profile"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{children:["Email: ",profile.email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{children:["Phone: ",profile.phone]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{children:["Age: ",profile.age]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{children:["Date of Birth: ",profile.date_of_birth]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h5",gutterBottom:true,style:{marginTop:'20px'},children:"Your Donations"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{container:true,spacing:3,children:profile.donations.map(donation=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,sm:6,md:4,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[donation.images.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardMedia,{component:"img",height:"180",image:donation.images[0],alt:donation.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",children:donation.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"body2",children:[donation.description.substring(0,100),"..."]})]})]})},donation.id))})]});};export default Profile;
